name: The Candy Collector
description:
My fist (technically second) game made using Processing :)

How To Play (because I forgot to include it in game):

  1.  Avoid picking up the fruits and vegetables, for each type has different consequences.
    > Broccoli: Increases player size. Reaching a size of 75 means game over.
    > Carrot: Temporarily turns every other fruit/vegetable invisible.
    > Apple: Temporarily increases speed for each fruit/vegetable.
  2.  Pick up the power-ups to gain advantages.
    > Cherry Bomb: Erases every fruit or vegetable currently on screen.
    > Gummy Bear: Brings the player size back to normal (50).
    > Lemon Candy: Temporarily freezes all fruits/vegetables currently on screen.
  3.  Collect candy.
    > Candy will fall from the top of the screen. Pick the candy up and, by using your mouse wheel, scroll towards the Candy Deposit Box and left click to shoot the candy.
  4. Score points.
    > Successfully shooting candy into the box will increase your score - try to get as many points as possible!

Audio Credits:

> Background Music: Setuniman, https://freesound.org/people/Setuniman/sounds/171394/

> Power-Up: Soundholder, https://freesound.org/people/Soundholder/sounds/425356/

> Game Over: myfox14, https://freesound.org/people/myfox14/sounds/382310/

> Bomb: colby12388, https://freesound.org/people/coby12388/sounds/222575/

> Shooting Noise: cabled_mess; https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350914/
